thread.title: BRIEF-Aéroport de Québec Says WestJet To Offer Direct Route Between Québec City & Calgary

title: BRIEF-Aéroport de Québec Says WestJet To Offer Direct Route Between Québec City & Calgary

organizations.name: westjet to offer direct route between québec city & calgary
route between québec city & calgary reuters

text:
April 10, 2018 / 3:13 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Aéroport de Québec Says WestJet To Offer Direct Route Between Québec City & Calgary Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Aéroport de Québec: 
* WESTJET TO OFFER DIRECT ROUTE QUÉBEC CITY - CALGARY BETWEEN JUNE AND OCTOBER 2018 
* AÉROPORT DE QUÉBEC SAYS WESTJET AIRLINES CONFIRMED IT WILL BE OFFERING A NEW DIRECT ROUTE BETWEEN QUÉBEC CITY AND CALGARY FROM JUNE 29 TO OCT. 26 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
